verses.verse: Now it fell on a <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the young <S%H5288>man<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come,<s%> and let us go <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>' <S%H4673>garrison,<s%> that is on the other <S%H5676>side.<s%>" But he <S%H5046>didn't<s%> tell his <S%H1>father.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> part of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> under the pomegranate <S%H7416>tree<s%> which is in <S%H4051>Migron:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with him were about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%>

and <S%H281>Ahijah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> <S%H350>Ichabod<s%>'s <S%H251>brother,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> <S%H5375>wearing<s%> an <S%H646>ephod.<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know that <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> was <S%H1980>gone.<s%>

Between the <S%H4569>passes,<s%> by which <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to go <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>' <S%H4673>garrison,<s%> there was a <S%H5553>rocky<s%> <S%H8127>crag<s%> on the one <S%H5676>side,<s%> and a <S%H5553>rocky<s%> <S%H8127>crag<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H949>Bozez,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5573>Seneh.<s%>

The <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8127>crag<s%> rose <S%H4690>up<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> in <S%H8127>front<s%> of <S%H4363>Michmash,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%> in <S%H4136>front<s%> of <S%H1387>Geba.<s%>

<S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the young <S%H5288>man<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come,<s%> and let us go <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of these <S%H6189>uncircumcised.<s%> It may be that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6213>work<s%> for <S%H4622>us;<s%> for there is no restraint on <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> by <S%H7227>many<s%> or by <S%H4592>few.<s%>"
His armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>him,<s%> "Do all that is in your <S%H3824>heart.<s%> <S%H5186>Turn<s%> <S%H3824>and,<s%> behold, I am with you according to your heart."
Then <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5674>"Behold,<s%> we will pass over to the <S%H582>men,<s%> and we will reveal ourselves to <S%H1540>them.<s%>
If they <S%H559>say<s%> thus to <S%H1826>us,<s%> 'Wait until we <S%H5060>come<s%> to <S%H5975>you!<s%>' then we will stand still in our <S%H5927>place,<s%> and will not go up to them.

But if they <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H5927>this,<s%> 'Come up to <S%H5927>us!<s%>' then we will go up; for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into our <S%H3027>hand.<s%> This shall be the sign to <S%H226>us.<s%>"

<S%H8147>Both<s%> of them <S%H1540>revealed<s%> themselves to the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5680>"Behold,<s%> the Hebrews are coming <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H2356>holes<s%> where they had hidden <S%H2244>themselves!<s%>"

The <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4675>garrison<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3045>us,<s%> and we will show you <S%H1697>something!<s%>" <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his armor <S%H5375>bearer,<s%> "Come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3068>me;<s%> for Yahweh has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

<S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> climbed <S%H5927>up<s%> on his <S%H3027>hands<s%> and on his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5307>him:<s%> and they fell <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan;<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H4191>killed<s%> them after <S%H310>him.<s%>

That <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter,<s%> which <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H5221>made,<s%> was about <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> within as it were <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H6776>furrow<s%>'s length in an <S%H4618>acre<s%> of <S%H7704>land.<s%>

There was a <S%H2731>trembling<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and among all the <S%H5971>people;<s%> the <S%H4673>garrison,<s%> and the <S%H7843>spoilers,<s%> they also <S%H2729>trembled;<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7264>quaked:<s%> so there was an exceeding <S%H430>great<s%> <S%H2731>trembling.<s%>

The <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7200>looked;<s%> and <S%H1995>behold,<s%> the multitude melted <S%H4127>away,<s%> <S%H3212>and<s%> <S%H1986>scattered.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H6485>him,<s%> "Count <S%H7200>now,<s%> and see who is <S%H1980>missing<s%> from <S%H6485>us.<s%>" When they had counted, <S%H3129>behold,<s%> Jonathan and his armor bearer were not <S%H5375>there.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H281>Ahijah,<s%> "Bring the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5066>here.<s%>" For the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at that <S%H3117>time.<s%>

It <S%H7586>happened,<s%> while Saul <S%H1696>talked<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that the <S%H1995>tumult<s%> that was in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H1980>on<s%> and <S%H7227>increased:<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H622>"Withdraw<s%> your <S%H3027>hand!<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with him were <S%H2199>gathered<s%> <S%H935>together,<s%> and came to the <S%H4421>battle:<s%> and <S%H376>behold,<s%> every man's <S%H2719>sword<s%> was against his <S%H7453>fellow:<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4103>confusion.<s%>

Now the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> who were with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8032>as<s%> <S%H865>before,<s%> and who went <S%H5927>up<s%> with them into the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> from all <S%H5439>around,<s%> even they also turned to be with the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> who were with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan.<s%>

Likewise all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who had <S%H2244>hidden<s%> themselves in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> even they also followed <S%H1692>hard<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them in the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
So <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3117>day:<s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> by Beth <S%H1007>Aven.<s%>

The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H5065>distressed<s%> that <S%H3117>day;<s%> for <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H422>adjured<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>"Cursed<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H398>eats<s%> any <S%H3899>food<s%> until it is <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and I am <S%H5358>avenged<s%> of my <S%H341>enemies.<s%>" So none of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2938>tasted<s%> <S%H3899>food.<s%>
All the <S%H776>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H3293>forest;<s%> and there was <S%H1706>honey<s%> <S%H6440>on<s%> the <S%H7704>ground.<s%>

When the <S%H5971>people<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> <S%H1706>behold,<s%> the honey <S%H1982>dropped:<s%> but no man <S%H5381>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H7621>oath.<s%>

But <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H8085>didn't<s%> hear when his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7650>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with the <S%H7650>oath:<s%> therefore he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4294>rod<s%> who was in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> it in the <S%H3295>honeycomb,<s%> and <S%H7725>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H215>enlightened.<s%>

Then <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7650>directly<s%> <S%H7650>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with an <S%H7650>oath,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>'" The <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5774>faint.<s%>

Then <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H1>father<s%> has <S%H5916>troubled<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%> Please <S%H7200>look<s%> how my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have been <S%H215>enlightened,<s%> because I <S%H2938>tasted<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> of this <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

How much <S%H637>more,<s%> if <S%H3863>perhaps<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> had <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H398>freely<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> of the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%> which they <S%H4672>found?<s%> For now has there been no <S%H7235>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> among the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"
They <S%H5221>struck<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H4363>Michmash<s%> to <S%H357>Aijalon.<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H5774>faint;<s%>

and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5860>flew<s%> on the <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> and <S%H1121>calves,<s%> and <S%H7819>killed<s%> them on the <S%H776>ground;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> them with the <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

Then they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5971>"Behold,<s%> the people are <S%H2398>sinning<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in that they <S%H398>eat<s%> meat with the <S%H1818>blood.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "You have dealt <S%H898>treacherously.<s%> <S%H1556>Roll<s%> a <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> to me this <S%H3117>day!<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6327>"Disperse<s%> yourselves among the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H5066>them,<s%> 'Bring me here every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7794>ox,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> them <S%H398>here,<s%> and eat; and <S%H2398>don't<s%> sin against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H398>eating<s%> meat with the <S%H1818>blood.<s%>'" All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5066>brought<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7794>ox<s%> with <S%H3027>him<s%> that <S%H3915>night,<s%> and killed them <S%H7819>there.<s%>
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> This was the <S%H2490>first<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> that he <S%H1129>built<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and take <S%H962>spoil<s%> among them until the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> and let us not <S%H7604>leave<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H559>them.<s%>" They said, <S%H6213>"Do<s%> whatever <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H3548>you.<s%>" Then the priest <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us draw <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H1988>here<s%> to <S%H430>God.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> counsel of <S%H430>God,<s%> "Shall I go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%> Will you <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>" But he <S%H6030>didn't<s%> answer him that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Draw <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H1988>here,<s%> all you <S%H6438>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> in <S%H4100>which<s%> this <S%H2403>sin<s%> has been this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3068>For,<s%> as Yahweh <S%H2416>lives,<s%> who <S%H3467>saves<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> though it <S%H3426>is<s%> in <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>" But there was not a man among all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who answered <S%H6030>him.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "You be on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5676>side,<s%> and I and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> will be on the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5676>side.<s%>" The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H6213>"Do<s%> what <S%H5869>seems<s%> good to <S%H2896>you.<s%>"

Therefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3051>"Show<s%> the <S%H8549>right.<s%>" <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> were <S%H3920>chosen;<s%> but the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>escaped.<s%>
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5307>"Cast<s%> lots between me and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> my <S%H1121>son.<s%>" <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> was <S%H3920>selected.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3129>Jonathan,<s%> <S%H5046>"Tell<s%> me what you have <S%H6213>done!<s%>" <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H5046>him,<s%> and said, "I <S%H2938>certainly<s%> did <S%H2938>taste<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%> with the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4294>rod<s%> that was in my <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I must <S%H4191>die.<s%>"
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> do <S%H6213>so<s%> and more <S%H3254>also;<s%> for you shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan.<s%>"

The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "Shall <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> who has <S%H6213>worked<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3444>salvation<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H2486>Far<s%> from <S%H3068>it!<s%> As Yahweh <S%H2416>lives,<s%> there shall not one <S%H8185>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> for he has <S%H6213>worked<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%> this <S%H3117>day!<s%>" So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6299>rescued<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan,<s%> that he <S%H4191>didn't<s%> die.
Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to their own <S%H4725>place.<s%>

Now when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H3920>taken<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> he <S%H3898>fought<s%> against all his <S%H341>enemies<s%> on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> against <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and against <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and against the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah,<s%> and against the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> and wherever he <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H7561>himself,<s%> he defeated them.

He <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6002>Amalekites,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of those who despoiled <S%H8154>them.<s%>

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> were <S%H3129>Jonathan,<s%> and <S%H3440>Ishvi,<s%> and <S%H4444>Malchishua;<s%> and the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H8034>these:<s%> the name of the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> <S%H4764>Merab,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H4324>Michal:<s%>

and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H293>Ahinoam<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H290>Ahimaaz.<s%> The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>army<s%> was <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1730>uncle.<s%>
<S%H7027>Kish<s%> was the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul;<s%> and <S%H5369>Ner<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H74>Abner<s%> was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H22>Abiel.<s%>

There was <S%H2389>severe<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> against the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul:<s%> and when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> any <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> or any <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> he took him to <S%H622>him.<s%>
